componentDescription: Provides a user interface for recording, playing, and uploading audio content.

onAudio.description: Callback function triggered when an audio file is successfully processed or recorded, providing the audio file.

recording.description: Indicates whether the audio recording is currently active.

paused.description: Indicates whether the audio recording is currently paused.

audioBlob.description: Stores the recorded audio data as a Blob, or null if no audio has been recorded.

analyserNode.description: Provides access to an AnalyserNode for audio visualization, or null if not initialized.

startRecording.description: Function to initiate the audio recording process.

stopRecording.description: Function to terminate the audio recording and finalize the audio file.

pauseRecording.description: Function to temporarily suspend the active audio recording.

resumeRecording.description: Function to resume a previously paused audio recording.

resetRecording.description: Function to clear any recorded audio and reset the recording state.

handleFileChange.description: Event handler for file input changes, typically used for uploading audio files.
